name: Hemadri Kathrotiya
summary:
o	Establishes sales objectives by forecasting and developing annual sales for B2B and B2 C department.
o	Managing of web portals - B2C and B2B department in association with subordinates.
o	Procurement as per the fashion and season trends.
o	Promotion and branding of products on web portals
o	Increase sales on web portals through marketing strategies by analyzing and evaluating portal’s Strength and Customer purchasing trends.
o	Forecasting – basis analysis and survey updating stocks to enhance sales.
•	Oversee marketing lead generation by maintaining relationships with clients.
•	Develop and manage new and existing clients by providing high caliber of service, explore and Identify all their needs
•	Work closely with marketing and promotion team to design required promotion and awareness campaigns for target market / clients
•	Recruitment as per the requirement of organization
•	Salary process and manpower planning along with retaining the Employee engagement activity.

member_experience_collection.title: B2C - B2B Ecomerrce Sales Head / HR Manager
o	Executive Assistant to Managing Director / HR Manager
member_experience_collection.description:
• Prepare HR Manual ( JD, organization’s policy, rules and regulations, Appriasal policy, attendance policy, Training policy, Admin expenses policy, Recruitment policy, Tours & travelling policy )
• Take care of Recruitment as per requirement
• Maintain Director’s calendar.
• Setup and coordinate meetings and conferences
• Create, transcribe, and distribute meeting agendas and minutes
• Perform general clerical duties to include but not limited to: photocopying, mailing, and filing
• Maintain hard copy and electronic filing system
• High degree of proficiency in MS Office
• Take reporting from HOD and submit to Director with analysis
• Professional verbal and written communication skills
• Excellent organizational skills
• Handle meeting in absence of Director
• Attain yearly strategic meeting at out of city
• Analysis of fund flow report on monthly basis.

member_experience_collection.title: Sales Executive
member_experience_collection.description:
• Attend the walk-in customers
• Identify the needs of the customers.
• Based on the identified need, offer the right product
• Negotiate with customers & close the sale
• Fulfill their documentation
• Provide them the best after sales services as when needed

member_experience_collection.title: Feild Sales Executive
member_experience_collection.description:
• Fix up the appointments with the customers
• Convince customer to renew the suspended account
• Collection of the payment of the customers.
• Providing best possible services to the customers
